doc.after: In a 1982 article in the journal Theory Society Lewis Clark College sociology professor Robert Goldman compared and contrasted Letterman s Ellsworth character and his training program to that of Werner Erhard s course Erhard Seminars Training Goldman noted that the episode spent time lampooning Werner Erhard and est like commercial pop psychologies However Goldman went on to note that the inherent problem with Ellsworth Revitalization Konditioning was not the training but Ellsworth himself 5
